title: Bedcover, mid-19th century
medium:
Medium: linen, silk, silver metallic thread
Technique: embroidered
description: Bedcover with embroidery in a design of six scenes said to illustrate events in the life of Manuel de Godoy (1767 – 1851) with surrounding floral motifs. Embroidery in soft shades of green, blue, yellow and cream silk in satin and surface stitches. Cream-colored cotton fringe with a lattice heading and cut skirt on three sides.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bedcover, mid-19th century. Medium: linen, silk, silver metallic thread
Technique: embroidered. 1947-112-1.
